original_title: Ma Richesse a Cause Mes Privations
overview: Married, owner of a training gym, a house and two gleaming cars, André Guilbault lives well...and intends to keep it that way. To this end, he decides to return to competitive bodybuilding and sets his sights on the title of Mr. Montréal, with which he hopes to attract newcomers, and new glory, to his once-reputable gym.
title: My Riches Have Caused My Privations
